name: Mr. YTP Guy
text: The man acted very smart, I called 4 times before closing, Would not pick up, didnt even look too see if anyone called. Can't even get a simple pizza. 2/5 for food, 0/5 for Customer Service. Would not recommend.

name: Travis Morris
text: This pizza is amazing!! I grew up eating at Godfathers as a kid and now that I am an adult I stop and grab a pizza each month when I pass through. I wish a Godfathers would open up closer to Chattanooga, TN though. Amazing pizza!!!!

name: Melony H
text: Pizza was excellent!! I will now go out of my way to get this pizza. The staff was exceptional and Traci made this pizza exactly the way it was intended to be made. Delicious!!

name: Paul Durham
text: Great place great people good service
